item.title: How to Use Claude Code Subagents for Complex Development Projects
item.description: Learn how Claude Code subagents create specialized AI teams for complex development. Complete guide with prompts, examples, and best practices. Link to article: https://goatreview.com/how-to-use-claude-code-subagents-tutorial/
